content: B22 8.0 22V Battery Ultimate-power 22V 8.0 Ah Li-ion battery for extreme run time ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate performance battery providing extreme run time for all Hilti 22V tools and extra boost in intense and serial applications Includes Hilti Cordless Power Care (CPC) technology – on-board processors monitor each battery cell to deliver more reliable, consistent and longer-lasting power on your jobsites Fully sealed electronics for increased protection against dust, humidity and water Rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing – up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Casing designed to cool the battery to the ideal temperature for faster charging and reduce overload during application Applications Intensive use in serial applications requiring maximum battery capacity for extended trigger time and ultimate performance Compatible with all Hilti 18V and 22V cordless tools Compatible with all Hilti C4/36 Li-ion chargers Applications in extreme temperature conditions – from 60° C (140° F) down to -17° C (1.4° F) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 2.54 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 5.7 x 3.8 x 3 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 2.54 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 5.7 x 3.8 x 3 in ### ITEMS- 2183185 - Industrial class B22v 8.0 ah - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 22/8.0 Battery pack
